Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires a dealer of motor fuel engaged in method of payment pricing to clearly post the price differences based on the method of payment
Summary: Requires a dealer of motor fuel engaged in method of payment pricing to clearly post the price differences based on the method of payment.
LawCode: Add ยง399-eee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring posting of method of payment pricing
